basic_information.scholarship_name: The Jeyaraj & Powell Family Endowed Scholarship in Psychology

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to international students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are declared a major within the Department of Psychology. Eligibility Requirements Must be an international student at UCO Must be a declared major within the Department of Psychology Minimum 3.25 GPA In a short essay (2 pages) Â– 1) highlight yourself to our scholarship committee and demonstrate why you are the best recipient. 2) Explain what receiving this scholarship will mean to you and your family
